arts.ttl: Parma vs Bologna, survival and Europe
arts.sum: Parma is the team with the most 0-0 draws in Serie A 2025/26: three in nine games, along with Pisa. The historic precedent was the 2004/05 relegation play-off: Parma remained in Serie A, losing 0-1 at home in the first leg and overturning the result in the return leg with a 2-0 win at the Dall`Ara.
